string.name: wp_continuingcare_activity_title
string.context: Title for the Continuing Care activity

string.name: wp_continuingcare_tutorial_overview
string.context: Tutorial text introducing the continuing care activity to the patient. %%CONTINUINGCARE is replaced with the name of the activity.

resources.string: %%CONTINUINGCARE giver dig mulighed for at gennemgå ressourcer, der tilbyder behandling efter udskrivning, og vælge dine foretrukne ressourcer.

string.name: wp_continuingcare_tutorial_overview_proxy
string.context: Tutorial text introducing the continuing care activity to the patient proxy. %%CONTINUINGCARE is replaced with the name of the activity. %%PATNAME is replaced with the name of the patient

resources.string: %%CONTINUINGCARE giver dig mulighed for at gennemgå ressourcer, der tilbyder behandling efter udskrivning, og vælge %%PATNAMEs foretrukne ressourcer.

string.name: wp_continuingcare_tutorial_overview_2
string.context: Tutorial text explaining more about the workings of continuing care to the patient.

resources.string: Gennemgå disse behandlingsmuligheder og markér dine præferencer. Hvis du løber ind i problemer under gennemgang af denne liste, skal du kontakte din forløbskoordinator.

string.name: wp_continuingcare_tutorial_overview_2_proxy
string.context: Tutorial text explaining more about the workings of continuing care to the patient proxy. %%PATNAME is replaced with the name of the patient

resources.string: Gennemgå disse behandlingsmuligheder og markér %%PATNAMEs præferencer. Hvis du løber ind i problemer, mens du gennemgår denne liste, skal du henvende dig til %%PATNAMEs forløbskoordinator.
